result.TUNING_TOWER: Tool to adjust a parameter at each Z height
result.RESTORE_GCODE_STATE: Restore a previously saved G-Code state
result.HELP: Report the list of available extended G-Code commands
result.QUERY_ADC: Report the last value of an analog pin
result.FIRMWARE_RESTART: Restart firmware, host, and reload config
result.TEMPERATURE_WAIT: Wait for a temperature on a sensor
result.SET_GCODE_OFFSET: Set a virtual offset to g-code positions
result.QUERY_ENDSTOPS: Report on the status of each endstop
result.GET_POSITION: Return information on the current location of the toolhead
result.STEPPER_BUZZ: Oscillate a given stepper to help id it
result.SET_IDLE_TIMEOUT: Set the idle timeout in seconds
result.RESTART: Reload config file and restart host software
